---
title: wallet:multisig:dkg:round1
seo: Wallet Multisig DKG Round One Account Creation
---

Performs round 1 of the FROST DKG protocol for multisig account creation.

# Usage

```sh
ironfish wallet:multisig:dkg:round1
```

The example below demonstrates how to run round 1 of DKG for a group of two participants, a minimum of two signers, and the participant name `participant0`. Use the [`wallet:multisig:participant:create`](/use/get-started/cli-cmd-wallet-multisig-participant-create) command to create participants identities.

<Terminal command="ironfish wallet:multisig:dkg:round1 \
--participantName participant0 \
-i 72c9f4746cc76d8a4d6a9a065fa78902cf6213842434e6de188cd5af04dec1022a3938c5e795f59b26b61600779f98650d784ff9f9c62d7b90d86ee15508ab16293a9b7b6de2851c1dc3bfc763fa5a4929ee284699ad984207df46cec8704c95f6e1e8a484df477b89d9e9cc8e14a859086868f618d971e256189e18afaa308a0b \
-i 72f64a2091abae9d5e46f16afcdff4cf4fd0acb593a006f60b61ca23656bc86fcb3aa013e98cc967f91d38e6ce62e607aaa0f63749ac510fd7c24451156ef54e1566d168a2f9e67518747f889713e688e986dd0d09a3eaab06be458da8b930f4dab2714c99d3b1961642c7c207bbd42b8159e8dbcd92efab95930c2d68a3bec307 \
-m 2
"
  output={`
Round 1 Encrypted Secret Package:




Round 1 Public Package:


  `}
/>

# Flags

| Flag | Description | Default |
| ---- | ----------- | ------- |
| `-i, --identity` |  Identity of a participant ||
| `-m, --minSigners` |  Minimum number of signers to meet signing threshold ||
| `-n, --participantName` | Name of the participant to use in round one ||
